description: Try our easy to follow Zap Muesli Bars recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Muesli,Low salt,Seafood free,Wheat free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Budget,Stone fruit
name: Zap Muesli Bars Recipe | Woolworths
recipeCategory: Snacks,Kids light meal & snack,Fresh Food Kids

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line an 18x28cm baking pan.
Add dates, apricots and rolled oats to a blender and blitz to a fine powder. Add pepitas and sunflower seeds. Pulse to roughly chop.
Transfer to a bowl and add cinnamon, olive oil spread, egg and maple syrup. Mix well. Press flat into pan.
Bake for 20 minutes or until firm. Cool for 10 minutes. Turn onto a board and cut into desired shapes.
